message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $9,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. It's a bit higher than I was hoping for. I'm willing to pay $7,500 for the product.

I understand you're looking for a better price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $7,500. I can meet you halfway at $8,500. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, $8,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $8,250.  This would be a fair price for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. However, I'm not quite ready to meet you at $8,250. I can offer you a slight discount, but I need to get closer to my target. I'll meet you at $8,750. It's still a great deal for you, and I'm confident you'll love the product.
